Author: allbits#5898
Content: Fyi, all, I just took a simple arbitrage on KMD/VRSC, all on Atomicdex mobile.  Because takers don't match with takers, it is possible for coins to be purchased for less than they can be sold in the very same instant. Happy hunting!
